description: A reading of greek of the fragments of the Presocratic philosophers, together with an introduction to the modern scholarship on the Presocratics. The course will begin with the mythopoetic worldview presented by Hesiod's Theogony, and follow its transformation above all in Heraclitus, Parmenides and Empedocies. UNDERGRADUATES NEED PERMISSION
name: PRESOCRATIC PHIL
